summary: One man decides to wage war against a gang of teenage punks besieging an affluent California community. Based on a true incident.
cast: Robert Culp|Marlyn Mason|Beah Richards|Jacqueline Scott|Ramon Bieri|Tom Leopold|Mark Lenard|Ivor Francis|Nicholas Hammond|Paul Jenkins|Don Dubbins|Christopher Gardner|Shelly Hines|Tony Farella|Robert Weaver|Don Stark|Michael Rupert|Scott Colomby|Jason Wingreen|Stuart Nisbet|Phillip Pine|Walt Davis|Sid Grossfeld|James Sikking|Gary Clarke|Richard Hervey|Byron Mabe|Jan Burrell
title: Ultraje
